price: (Wasan nso asoma no ama) wͻn mu wᴐn a wͻnnya mεkaa wͻn ho. Ɔne Otumfoͻ no a Otumi ade nyinaa yε, Onyansafoͻ no.
arabic: وَءَاخَرِينَ مِنۡهُمۡ لَمَّا يَلۡحَقُواْ بِهِمۡۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: waākharīna min'hum lammā yalḥaqū bihim wahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
